com.graphql_java_generator.samples.forum.client.Queries

Packages that use Queries 
Package Description
com.graphql_java_generator.samples.forum.client.graphql  

  • Uses of Queries in com.graphql_java_generator.samples.forum.client.graphql

    Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.samples.forum.client.graphql that implement Queries 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DirectQueries
    This class implements the simplest way to call GraphQl queries, with the GraphQL Java Generator
    class  PreparedQueries
    This class implements the away to call GraphQl queries, where all queries are prepared before execution.
    The advantages are: Performance: this avoid to build an ObjectResponse for each response.
    class  WithBuilder
    This class implements the away to call GraphQl queries, where all queries are prepared before execution.
    The advantages are: Performance: this avoid to build an ObjectResponse for each response.
